name: Polka
summary:
Rpg created by Commodorette.
Polka is the second game in the Time Traveler Universe trilogy.
In this world, magic and relative unnatural events are the norm. It is a magical world where there are humans, "fairies", creatures similar to dragons, also called Gigas, Demons, Wizards, Sorcerers and finally, Witches.
Due to the content of the game, it will be classified for over 16 years as it has sensitive topics such as child abuse, necrophilia, and other sensitive topics that may hurt the sensitivity of the players, and some scenes of gore.
